page.title: 01CREWE, CHESHIRE (03680354)
page.content:
This block includes the town of{Crewe and is almost entirely urban. Crewe is an industrial cum market town on the south eastern edge of the{Cheshire {Plain,}6km from the M6 motorway. Main industries include British Rail Locomotive Works and Rolls Royce Motors. There is also a new industrial estate with many smaller industries.
Crewe is a major railway junction with six main lines leading into the block. There is a large central area of 19th century terraced housing with 20th century estates around the periphery.
Crewe has a cattle market on Mondays and a retail market on Mondays and Fridays. Early closing is on Wedensdays.
